field.name: ma_nv
field.check: ma_nv not in (select ma_nv from hrnv)

field.name: ngay_hl
field.check: (doi_tuong + tinh_thue_yn + tinh_gt_yn + hop_dong_yn + uy_quyen_yn <> '') and ngay_hl is null

field.name: ma_pt
field.check: ma_pt = '' and ((ten_pt <> '') or (ngay_sinh is not null) or (cmnd <> '') or (mst_pt <> '') or (quoc_tich <> '') or (quan_he <> '') or (so_khai_sinh <> '') or (quyen_so <> '') or (quoc_gia <> '') or (tinh_thanh <> '') or (quan_huyen <> '') or (phuong_xa <> '') or (ngay_hl_tu is not null) or (ngay_hl_den is not null) or (kem_theo <> '') or (dien_giai <> '') or (so_lan <> 0))

field.name: ma_loai_gt
field.check: ma_loai_gt not in (select ma_loai_gt from dmloaigt)

field.name: quoc_tich
field.check: quoc_tich <> '' and quoc_tich not in (select ma_qt from dmqt)

field.name: loai_qh
field.check: loai_qh <> '' and loai_qh not in (select loai_qh from dmqhpt)

field.name: ngay_hl_tu
field.check: ma_pt <> '' and ngay_hl_tu is null⩓ngay_hl_den is not null and ngay_hl_den < ngay_hl_tu

text.v: Thông tin thuế TNCN nhân viên

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @count int, @datetime0 datetime select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0, @datetime0 = getdate()
-- Check &Checking;
select top 0 identity(int, 1, 1) as id, ma_nv, ma_pt, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, 0 as stt into #check from @@table insert into #check select ma_nv, ma_pt, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, stt from @@table where ma_pt <> '' order by ngay_hl_tu select @field = 'ngay_hl_tu' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00002' from #check a where exists(select 1 from #check b where a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and b.ngay_hl_tu < a.ngay_hl_den and a.id = b.id - 1) &w1;'ma_nv'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from #check a where exists(select 1 from #check b where a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and b.ngay_hl_tu < a.ngay_hl_den and a.id = b.id - 1)&Error; end select @field = 'ngay_hl_den' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00002' from #check a where exists(select 1 from #check b where a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and a.ngay_hl_den is null and a.id = b.id - 1) &w1;'ma_nv'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from #check a where exists(select 1 from #check b where a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and a.ngay_hl_den is null and a.id = b.id - 1)&Error; end
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end &CommandCheckTaxCodeImport; &EndErrorMode;
-- Gather select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.ma_so_thue, a.doi_tuong, a.tinh_thue_yn, a.tinh_gt_yn, a.hop_dong_yn, a.uy_quyen_yn, a.cn_nn_duoi12, b.ngay_sinh as ngay_hl, b.dien_giai as ghi_chu, b.ma_pt, b.ten_pt, b.ngay_sinh, b.ma_loai_gt, b.cmnd, b.ma_so_thue as mst_pt, b.quoc_tich, b.loai_qh, b.quan_he, b.so_khai_sinh, b.quyen_so, b.quoc_gia, b.tinh_thanh, b.quan_huyen, b.phuong_xa, b.ngay_hl_den as ngay_hl_tu, b.ngay_hl_den, b.kem_theo, b.dien_giai, b.so_lan, b.line_nbr as stt into #r from hrtttncn a, hrttctpt b
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.ma_so_thue, case when a.doi_tuong = '''' then ''1'' else a.doi_tuong end, case when a.tinh_thue_yn = '''' then ''1'' else a.tinh_thue_yn end, case when a.tinh_gt_yn = '''' then ''1'' else a.tinh_gt_yn end, case when a.hop_dong_yn = '''' then ''1'' else a.hop_dong_yn end, case when a.uy_quyen_yn = '''' then ''1'' else a.uy_quyen_yn end, case when a.uy_quyen_yn = ''0'' then 0 else a.cn_nn_duoi12 end, a.ngay_hl, a.ghi_chu, a.ma_pt, a.ten_pt, a.ngay_sinh, a.ma_loai_gt, a.cmnd, a.mst_pt, a.quoc_tich, a.loai_qh, a.quan_he, a.so_khai_sinh, a.quyen_so, a.quoc_gia, a.tinh_thanh, a.quan_huyen, a.phuong_xa, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.kem_theo, a.dien_giai, a.so_lan, a.stt from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q update #r set uy_quyen_yn = 0, cn_nn_duoi12 = 0 where not (doi_tuong = 1 and hop_dong_yn = 1)
select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, doi_tuong, tinh_thue_yn, tinh_gt_yn, uy_quyen_yn, cn_nn_duoi12, hop_dong_yn, ngay_hl, ghi_chu, cast(0 as int) as stt into #d1 from hrtttncnct
insert into #d1 select stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, doi_tuong, tinh_thue_yn, tinh_gt_yn, uy_quyen_yn, cn_nn_duoi12, hop_dong_yn, ngay_hl, ghi_chu, stt from #r where ngay_hl is not null order by stt_rec, ngay_hl, stt
select a.stt_rec, a.ma_so_thue, isnull(d.doi_tuong, a.doi_tuong) as doi_tuong, isnull(d.tinh_thue_yn, a.tinh_thue_yn) as tinh_thue_yn, isnull(d.tinh_gt_yn, a.tinh_gt_yn) as tinh_gt_yn, isnull(d.hop_dong_yn, a.hop_dong_yn) as hop_dong_yn, isnull(d.uy_quyen_yn, a.uy_quyen_yn) as uy_quyen_yn, isnull(d.cn_nn_duoi12, a.cn_nn_duoi12) as cn_nn_duoi12 into #m1 from #r a left join (select stt_rec, doi_tuong, tinh_thue_yn, tinh_gt_yn, uy_quyen_yn, cn_nn_duoi12, hop_dong_yn from #d1 b where ngay_hl = (select max(ngay_hl) from #d1 c where b.stt_rec = c.stt_rec)) d on a.stt_rec = d.stt_rec join (select stt_rec, min(stt) as stt from #r group by stt_rec) z on a.stt_rec = z.stt_rec and a.stt = z.stt
select stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, ma_pt, ten_pt, ngay_sinh, ma_loai_gt, cmnd, mst_pt, quoc_tich, loai_qh, quan_he, so_khai_sinh, quyen_so, quoc_gia, tinh_thanh, quan_huyen, phuong_xa, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, kem_theo, dien_giai, so_lan, stt into #dep1 from #r where ma_pt <> '' order by stt_rec, ma_pt, ngay_hl_tu
-- Check double select @$errorField = 'ngay_hl', @$errorRow = min(stt) from #d1 group by stt_rec, ngay_hl having count(ngay_hl) > 1 if @$errorRow is not null begin select '' as message, @$errorField as field, @$errorRow as record; return end; select @$errorField = 'ngay_hl_tu', @$errorRow = min(stt) from #dep1 group by stt_rec, ma_pt, ngay_hl_tu having count(ngay_hl_tu) > 1 if @$errorRow is not null begin select '' as message, @$errorField as field, @$errorRow as record; return end; &EndErrorMode;
if @type = '0' begin delete #m1 from #m1 a where exists(select 1 from hrtttncn b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec) delete #d1 from #d1 a where exists(select 1 from hrtttncnct b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl) delete #dep1 from #dep1 a where exists(select 1 from hrttctpt b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu) end
select a.stt_rec, a.ma_so_thue, a.doi_tuong, a.tinh_thue_yn, a.tinh_gt_yn, a.hop_dong_yn, a.uy_quyen_yn, a.cn_nn_duoi12 into #m2 from #m1 a join hrtttncn b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec delete #m1 from #m1 a where exists(select 1 from #m2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec) if @type = '1' &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; select a.stt_rec, a.doi_tuong, a.tinh_thue_yn, a.tinh_gt_yn, a.hop_dong_yn, a.uy_quyen_yn, a.cn_nn_duoi12, a.ngay_hl, a.ghi_chu into #d2 from #d1 a join hrtttncnct b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl delete #d1 from #d1 a where exists(select 1 from #d2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl)
select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ma_pt, a.ten_pt, a.ngay_sinh, a.ma_loai_gt, a.cmnd, a.mst_pt, a.quoc_tich, a.loai_qh, a.quan_he, a.so_khai_sinh, a.quyen_so, a.quoc_gia, a.tinh_thanh, a.quan_huyen, a.phuong_xa, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.kem_theo, a.dien_giai, a.so_lan into #dep2 from #dep1 a join hrttctpt b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu delete #dep1 from #dep1 a where exists(select 1 from #dep2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu)
-- Insert @@inserting(master);
select @count = count(*) from #d1 if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0 into #sttDetail from #d1 select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_hl, identity(int, 1, 1) as stt into #o1Detail from #r
insert into #sttDetail select b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #d1 a join hrtttncnct b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec, a.ngay_hl
insert into #o1Detail(stt_rec, ngay_hl) select stt_rec, ngay_hl from (select stt_rec, ngay_hl from #d1 union select distinct stt_rec, null from #d1) a order by stt_rec, ngay_hl
select stt, stt_rec into #o2Detail from #o1Detail where ngay_hl is null
update #d1 set stt = b.stt + cast(isnull(c.stt_rec0, 0) as int) from #d1 a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.stt_rec, c.ngay_hl from #o1Detail c join #o2Detail d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl left join #sttDetail c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec
@@inserting(detail); end
-- Dependant select @count = count(*) from #dep1 if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0 into #stt from #dep1 select top 0 stt_rec, ma_pt, cast(null as smalldatetime) as ngay_hl, identity(int, 1, 1) as stt into #o1 from #r
insert into #stt select b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #dep1 a join hrttctpt b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec, a.ma_pt, a.ngay_hl_tu
insert into #o1(stt_rec, ma_pt, ngay_hl) select stt_rec, a.ma_pt, ngay_hl_tu from (select stt_rec, ma_pt, ngay_hl_tu from #dep1 union select distinct stt_rec, '', null from #dep1) a order by stt_rec, ma_pt, ngay_hl_tu
select stt, stt_rec into #o2 from #o1 where ngay_hl is null
update #dep1 set stt = b.stt + cast(isnull(c.stt_rec0, 0) as int) from #dep1 a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.stt_rec, c.ma_pt, c.ngay_hl from #o1 c join #o2 d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pt = b.ma_pt and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl left join #stt c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec
@@inserting(dependant); end
-- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrtttncn set @@list(master); from hrtttncn a join #m2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec update hrtttncnct set @@list(detail); from hrtttncnct a join #d2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl update hrttctpt set @@list(dependant); from hrttctpt a join #dep2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 end
